Class util

extends Object
    A class containing utility methods for Controller

    • Method Detail

      • alertUser

        static void alertUser(String header,
                      String s,
                      String title,
                      Alert.AlertType alertType)
        Displays a custom dialog to the end user
        Parameters:
        header - The header text of the alert
        s - The String to display
        title - The title of the alert
        alertType - The Alert.AlertType for the dialog
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Alert.AlertType

      • infoAlert

        static void infoAlert(String s,
                      String header)
        Shows an informational alert with message s

        Simpler than alertUser(String, String, String, Alert.AlertType)
        Parameters:
        s - The message to display
        header - The header of the alert (usually a summary)

      • noWinDecor

        static void noWinDecor(Stage initStage)
        Takes away all OS specific window borders (Minimize, Maximize, and Close buttons, etc.)

        This will eventually be used for a splash screen
        Parameters:
        initStage - the stage to make have no window borders
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • errorAlert

        static void errorAlert(String s,
                       String header)
        Display an error alert with message s
        Parameters:
        s - The message to display
        header - The header of the error (usually a summary)

      • confirmExit

        static boolean confirmExit()
        Display a custom CONFIRMATION dialog when exiting the program
        Returns:
        boolean - Whether or not "YES" is clicked or not. True if yes, false if no.

      • getScreenSize

        static Dimension getScreenSize()
        Gets the current screen size
        Returns:
        Dimension
